Type.Name: OnUrlHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public sealed delegate void OnUrlHandler (object o, Gtk.OnUrlArgs args);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the OnUrlHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the OnUrlHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the OnUrlHandler is removed from the event.
